data.title: 210 Clint Eastwood Trivia Questions, Answers, and Fun Facts
data.meta_description: Over 210 trivia questions and answers about  Clint Eastwood in our People Themed E-K category.  Did you know these fun bits of trivia and interesting bits of information?
data.text:
FREE! Click here to Join FunTrivia. Thousands of games, quizzes, and lots more!

Related Questions & Answers: Tom Hanks

Search in topic:

9 Why are "A Fistful of Dollars", "For a Few Dollars More" and "The Good, The Bad and The Ugly" called the "Spaghetti Westerns"?

Answer: All were directed by and starred mostly Italians.

Sergio Leone was the director of all three and almost the entire cast and crew were Italian. However, they were filmed in Spain.

From Quiz: Clint Eastwood Westerns

34 There have been many quotes spawned by the crime and drama collection that features Clint's best performance as the volatile Harry Callahan. Which of the five flicks inspired everyone in America to ask: "Do you feel lucky, punk?"

Answer: Dirty Harry

The first of a series that stayed consistently funny, shocking, and full of action, this movie really rocketed Clint to stardom as a hard-case homicide detective. He doesn't take guff from anyone as he works to stop an insane serial killer, while trying to work around the political red tape that surrounds the case. Watch "Dead Pool" the last movie in the series for a cameo by Jim Carrey as a satanist rock musician.

Your options: [ Dirty Harry ] [ The Enforcer ] [ Dead Pool ] [ Sudden Impact ]

From Quiz: Clint Eastwood Dust-up

36 In "The Outlaw Josey Wales", what is Granny's reply to the store clerk when he tells her what state he is from?

Answer: "I never cared much for Hoosiers, neither."

Granny and her clan were Jayhawkers and "proud of it!" Being a native Hoosier, I just thought it was cool that Indiana was mentioned.

From Quiz: Clint Eastwood Westerns

39 Clint was nominated for a Best Actor Oscar for this film, but lost to Al Pacino.

Answer: Unforgiven

Clint was nominated for his portrayal of William Munny in 'Unforgiven', but lost to Pacino for 'Scent of a Woman'. Robbery, IMHO.

Your options: [ Unforgiven ] [ In the Line of Fire ] [ The Bridges of Madison County ] [ Escape from Alcatraz ]

From Quiz: Clint Eastwood Movies

40 1993 - An aging Secret Service agent is once again put to the test as a clever assassin threatens the life of the President.

Answer: In the Line of Fire

John Malkovich couldn't be better. Clint ain't bad himself.

Your options: [ The Dead Pool ] [ White Hunter, Black Heart ] [ Firefox ] [ In the Line of Fire ]

From Quiz: Clint Eastwood Movies
